document.full_text: japan plan to host two scheduled international soccer friendlies later this month despite the devastation caused by the biggest earthquake on record, which triggered a 10-meter tsunami that submerged the country's northeast coast.
document.title: japan to play soccer friendlies to "rally nation"
lines_and_colors: japan plan to host two scheduled international soccer friendlies later this month despite the devastation caused by the biggest earthquake on record, which triggered a 10-meter tsunami that submerged the country's northeast coast.
